participant_1.name: Katie
participant_1.personality: easy-going and friendly, with a passion for music and spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I am a casual dresser. My favorite band is Nirvana. I am overall happy with life. I am a waitress at a local restaurant. My car needs some repairs.

participant_2.name: Tyler
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and adventurous, with a love for sports and a strong sense of loyalty to friends.
participant_2.background: My mom is a painter. I went to Japan this summer. My favorite sport is hockey. My best friend just moved away. I start my senior year of high school next week.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hey, not much. Just got back from Japan.
Oh, that's awesome! How was it?
It was amazing! I got to see so many beautiful places and meet so many interesting people.
That sounds amazing! I'm so glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm still trying to get over jet lag, but it was worth it.
I can imagine. So, what are you doing next?
I start my senior year of high school next week. I'm kind of nervous, but I'm also excited.
I'm sure you'll do great! You're smart and funny, and I know you'll make a lot of new friends.
Thanks, I appreciate that!
So, what's your favorite sport?
I love hockey! I've been playing since I was a little kid.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to play hockey, but I'm not very good at it.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. So, what's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Nirvana. I love their music and their style.
Oh, that's cool! I like Nirvana too. I'm actually wearing a Nirvana t-shirt right now.
Really? That's awesome! I love Nirvana t-shirts.
Yeah, they're the best. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play hockey, and hang out with my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun. I like to do similar things. I like to go to concerts, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Oh, that's cool! I like video games too. What's your favorite game?
My favorite game is Call of Duty. I've been playing it since I was a kid.
Oh, that's cool! I've never played Call of Duty, but I've heard good things about it.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. So, what do you want to do for lunch?
I'm not sure. What do you want to do?
I'm not sure either. What do you have in mind?
I'm not sure. What are you in the mood for?
I'm in the mood for something healthy.
So, do you want to go to a salad bar?
That sounds good.
Okay, let's go to the salad bar.
